def clean_df(path: str, col1: str, col2: str) -> pd.DataFrame:
    '''
    Takes in a DataFrame, and returns the DataFrame with only
    the desired columns.    
    '''
    df_ = pd.read_csv(path)
    df = df_[[col1, col2]]
    assert df_.shape[0] == df.shape[0]
    return df
